content.question: In reading the landscape of the image, a geographer will most likely describe the land-survey pattern shown as typical of which of the following locations?

choices.label: A rural agricultural region in the United States
An agricultural region of eastern Canada
A rainforest development in southern Brazil

content.answer: A rural agricultural region in the United States

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Describe the spatial patterns presented in visual sources.
